 > if Foo's ctor starts throwing exceptions, all of a sudden the test
 > class is leaking connections, since tearDown() is not called if setUp
 > () throws an unexpected exception.

<ads>
if you only want the tearDown method to be called, try the TestSetup 
class of the JUnit-addons package 
<http://junit-addons.sourceforge.net/junitx/extensions/TestSetup.html>.

Project website:
<http://junit-addons.sourceforge.net>
</ads>

-Vladimir
